nodes.text: A Class Two multi-phasic robot was a second degree droid used for information retrieval and analysis, pilot duties, along with other technical uses. The multi-phasic portion of this droid incorporated a personality and was able to employ a decision-making process which was not part of its original programming. This droid also incorporated intellectual and emotional capacities roughly equalling organic sentients.
Vuffi Raa was a Class Two multi-phasic robot.
